channel.title: Amend Name of Transaction Type 'Interest Repayment'
channel.description: Transaction type code 5 on the [Transaction Type Codelist](http://iatistandard.org/202/codelists/TransactionType/) currently has a name of 'Interest Repayment' However, this should actually be 'Interest Payment' and so the name should be amended

item.title: Amend Name of Transaction Type 'Interest Repayment'
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.description:
Transaction type code 5 on the Transaction Type Codelist currently has a name of ‘Interest Repayment’ However, this should actually be ‘Interest Payment’ and so the name should be amended

Read full topic
item.source: Amend Name of Transaction Type 'Interest Repayment'
